title: Could not remove a virtual camera from the list of devices shown
content: Hello, a program is still showing up in the device/s that Firefox would like to use whenever it's asking permission to use. The problem is, this virtual screen capture/camera software (3tene) is already uninstalled in my pc but it still keeps on showing up. I tried checking if there are any leftover files and could not find any. I thought maybe there's something wrong with Firefox this time? Still trying to narrow things down.
creator: edrickce
